articles.title: Asteroid 2024 YR4 no longer poses significant impact risk - European Space Agency
articles.description: The latest analysis from the European Space Agency (ESA) Planetary Defence Office has reduced the probability that asteroid 2024 YR4 might impact Earth in 2032 to 0.001%.
